name: Andrew Atkins
coverLetter:
I'm from California but have been living and apprenticing in Nelson, B.C. for the past four years. I have 8 years experience cloning, transplanting, pruning, feeding schedules, harvesting, and trimming. I have lots of experience setting up/building indoor rooms, outdoor gardens, and light dep greenhouses. I have a strong electrical and overall handyman background as I transitioned from construction management 8 years ago. 

I am in transition right now looking for work and a place to camp. I can take my own food. Looking forward to hearing from you... Thank you!
